Html:
I wanted to check if there is any guidance documents for XAML regarding naming and styling conventions.

Thanks in advance for any help :)

Bob Hanson

Hi Bob,  I'm putting together a training package for the team and the closest thing to standards that I could find follows:

http://www.paulstovell.com/blog/xaml-and-wpf-coding-guidelines

Let us know if you find anything else/better.

Bill
